org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer

Class BeanQueryFactory<Q extends AbstractBeanQuery>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vaadin.addons.lazyquerycontainer.BeanQueryFactory<Q>
  • Type Parameters:
    Q - The BeanQuery implementation class
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, QueryFactory

    public final class BeanQueryFactory<Q extends AbstractBeanQuery>
extends Object
implements QueryFactory, Serializable
    QueryFactory implementation for BeanQuery. BeanQuery can be used to simplify implementation of queries returning JavaBeans.
    Author:
    Tommi Laukkanen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
